column5: The Mission is a welcoming home situated in the unique and historic Methodist Encampment neighborhood. The home boasts artful craftsmanship in every detail and is well furnished and stocked with practical items to make your stay enjoyable.   The Mission Provides: -Open-concept living space -Kitchen -Bedroom 1, queen bed -Bedroom 2/office, convertible couch/single bed -Full bathroom, tub and shower -Patio -Free parking  The home comfortably sleep three adults or two adults and two children.
column8: The Mission - Artfully Crafted Hill Country Cabin
